titleStmt.title: Israels redemption by Christ Wherein is confuted the Arminian vniuersall redemption.
titleStmt.author: Sweeper, Walter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones, dwelling in Redcrosse-street,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Some print faded; some pages stained.
